extendedInfo.description: NOTE: Please try the free demo version ("Klink Demo (Red Edition)" on the market) to test compatibility before buying.  The demo can be upgraded via the market without any further configuration on your computer.Klink is a utility by Faveset LLC for connecting a PC to your Android device over USB.- Supports Windows (XP/Vista/7/32-bit/64-bit), Mac OS X 10.5 (or later), and Ubuntu (32-bit/64-bit)- Does not require a rooted deviceNOTE TO PURCHASERS OF THE ORIGINAL KLINK: Your purchase is still valid.  It is NOT necessary to buy Klink (Red Edition), as functionality is unchanged.  Please visit the "Download" page at www.faveset.com to download the original version of Klink, or email support if you have questions.USAGE:After installing and running Klink, please tap "Set up your Computer" and follow the instructions.  Klink requires the installation of a small companion program on your PC, so following the step-by-step guide is suggested.HELP: Please visit the Google Group via http://www.faveset.com/klink/support, or email klink@faveset.com.It would be appreciated if you asked for help before posting negative feedback, as virtually all problems can be resolved.  Otherwise, please leave your email address when commenting so that someone can get in touch with you.As some users may have difficulty evaluating everything within the 15-minute refund window, a once-per-user 24-hour return policy is in effect; simply include your order number when contacting support.  No one should feel rushed.  Please contact support if you need any help during setup.

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: I have had this app for some time now and it works great ...developer answers questions and helps with any problems should they arise . use this app everyday for tether and saves money without having to get broadband for laptop. 5 stars all around.
reviews.author: michael k

reviews.title: Sprint is terminating...
reviews.comment: My service for using this app. Be warned. They will find you and terminate your service as you are violating your contract.
reviews.author: Fallon Stokes

reviews.title: Never Fails Me!
reviews.comment: Easy to use!
reviews.author: Charles Watkins

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: Perfect
reviews.author: Dominick Sevier

reviews.comment: Works perfect on My HTC LTE EVO
reviews.author: Rogelio Mu\303\261oz

reviews.title: Worth the money
reviews.comment: PREVIOUS: This app is absolutely great when it is connected.  It has saved me a ton of money since I don\'t have to pay for a home internet service.  The only problem is that it randomly disconnects frequently and the computer program frequently gets an error and stops working.  Worth the money though. UPDATE:updating the software on my computer seemed to do the trick.  Sprint finally fixed our internet signal so I was finally able to try it out and I haven\'t had to reconnect once.  Thank you for your help!!
reviews.author: Kari Koniowsky

reviews.title: Alsome
reviews.comment: The best usb tether app I\'ve ever seen 5/5 stars.
reviews.author: Larry Kidwell

reviews.title: One of best apps on my cell
reviews.comment: Hands down one of the best apps I have. When I\'m lacking WiFi, klink saves the day (assuming I have decent reception). Takes the mobile office to a new level, when I\'m in the passenger seat and need to work! Glad I found this a while back!
reviews.author: Jamie Lin

reviews.title: Application of the year
reviews.comment: I tried every wifi and tethering application out their,  this is THE ONLY app that work flawlessly now I can be free from coffee houses and be able to chat on Skype with my spouse overseas at any time I want or need and don\'t have to pay for expensive IP provider. I tested this app for 2 months and an anal as well as very picky about what I approve. Thank you so much. PS if ya could make this app wifi or where I can connect  my android tablet to the internet that would be awesome. And I would pay for it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice Program
reviews.comment: I just downloaded and installed on an HTC EVO 3D and it was totally painless. Works great and was able to view Facebook, YouTube and several other \"heavy\" sites with no problem! So far, so good! I would recommend it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HTC Sense One 4G
reviews.comment: I hooked this thing up to my pc with 4G and I swear its faster than my 54mb/s WiFi at home. Tyvm Klink. Worth every penny.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best Bang for your Bucks
reviews.comment: Kevin helped me out with my purchase and making sure the product worked properly on my computer. For this low fee you can\'t beat it! Try it, you will love it... And if you don\'t you can get your money back... Which you won\'t. - the Reel Ace
reviews.author: Adam Spencer

reviews.title: Totally Awesome
reviews.comment: This app is Totally Awesome,I downloaded the Klink demo red first, Followed all instrutions,Took about 15 to 20 mln. Then I upgraded to the Full Version.which is the Best.Thks JM
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Get your moneys worth
reviews.comment: Works well on Epic Touch 4G. Only complaint is a connection failure after an hour of use. I recommend only if PdaNet isn\'t compatible with your phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best investment!
reviews.comment: I had some trouble getting started but I received a very quick reply on getting it up and running. It works like a champ. I can get internet where ever I have my phone. why pay for hot spot on your phone when you can get this? I recommend!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great.
reviews.comment: Great app. User interface is a bit lacking, but app works great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Klink (Red)
reviews.comment: Works well on Razr and Win7 Pro 64 bit. Speed test on cell phone seems faster than on PC so I took off one star. But this is also true for Easy Tether so it may deserve 5. I have not been able to get PdaNet to work on my setup so I can\'t compare speeds.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best app
reviews.comment: This app works great on my low end phone - sony w8. I dont need to pay streamyx anymore. Thank u. Very usefull
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome Tech Support !!!
reviews.comment: App works flawlessly on HTC Thunderbolt. Support helped me figure out I had a bad USB cable. Very quick team. Very good app. Five stars from me !!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: THANK YOU!!!
reviews.comment: Worth every penny! I was so mad when my.provider made this and all other 3G phones incapable of producing a hotspot. If you can install this on your computer (I wasn\'t confident, and it took a long time, but it all worked out) you can have internet in your PC. I am so glad I bought this one. First app I ever paid for.
reviews.author: A Google User
